GreenData Mobile App
GreenData Mobile Application
is specialized software for smartphones and tablets, designed for efficient collaboration with colleagues, quick decision-making, and control over workflows configured in the platform application (hereinafter referred to as the instance).
Operation in the native GreenData mobile application is only possible when connected to a pre-configured instance.
Functional Capabilities
The GreenData mobile application combines communication, task management, and data processing capabilities, providing:
a convenient corporate messenger for interacting with colleagues in both personal and group chats, which allows user to:
exchange text messages, files, links, images;
conduct audio and video calls with the ability to view the screen of the user sharing their screen via
GreenData Messenger
;
personalize user statuses;
draw attention to important discussions in group chats using the user mention feature;
configure quick access to key information using the pinning feature for important messages and chats;
use convenient message search and structured storage of forwarded files and images in chats;
access to employee profile data of the connected instance;
ability to receive timely notifications about new task assignments, manage tasks, and track their deadlines;
ability to manage objects and analyze data:
view and edit object data;
analyze data on dashboards;
start business processes
with appropriate permissions.
Setup and Getting Started
To use the GreenData mobile application as a messenger, view the employee directory, and manage tasks, just follow a few simple steps:
Download and install the application on your mobile device.
Connect to an existing instance and log in to the system.
Optionally configure the application according to your needs and personal preferences.
For detailed descriptions, refer to the articles:
Installing and Logging into GreenData Mobile Application
